attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country is suffering the consequences of 11 years of spendthrift, authoritarian government of the most interfering and damaging sort imaginable in what fancies itself as a free democracy.

The truth is the British people are arguably less free than at any time in their history , and certainly since the enlightenment (which, paradoxically, had its origins in Scotland).

They have been softened up by the creation of a client state effectively buying power with the tax take from a beleaguered middle class.  

This must end and a libertarian, low tax, decentralised government should take its place.

Finally there must be a referendum on the EU constitution.  I quote here the government's own mantra - "if you (the govt) have nothing to hide you have nothing to fear"

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
